definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: slit (nose, lip, ear, etc.), mutilate, esp. face (Ar. xaramun perforate, pierce, slit the partition between the nostrils, or the lip, or the lobe of the ear)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pass. [[אִישׁ עִוֵּר]] [[אוֹ פִּסֵּחַ אוֹ חָרֻם אוֹ שָׂרוּעַ]] a man blind or lame or mutilated in the face (in nose, lip, ear, etc.), or too long in a limb Le 21:18 (H), v. Di (Kn).
